text: <@U0H4SJN11> and <@U02F8LF2X> do you hope to finish the podium work today, as planned?/
Yup. Just need to finish up some connectors and wire them in and do final tests.
when do you hope to be doing final tests?  I’d love to come by/help for that

<@U0H4SJN11> Nathan confirmed Wednesday 2pm as the time to bring Podiums back to DDD to re-integrate and test the upgraded Podiums in the rest of the production set up.

following that meeting, we’ll want to bring everyone together for final experience testing.
